data.title: Consolidation of California Cannabis Licensing Authorities
data.excerpt:
To All Interested Parties,
We are proud to share Governor Newsom’s budget proposal for cannabis industry regulation and taxation, announced by the Governor today.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: California Department of Food and Agriculture
